summary: This is an email from defense attorney Christian Everdell to Judge Nathan and others, transmitting Ghislaine Maxwell's supplemental pretrial motions and exhibits under seal in her criminal case. It indicates the filing of an omnibus memorandum supporting motions related to the S2 superseding indictment.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Attorney from Cohen & Gresser LLP sending the supplemental pretrial motions and exhibits to the court and government on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Nathan
persons.context: U.S. District Judge Alison Nathan, the presiding judge in the case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell, to whom the filing is addressed.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case S2 20 Cr. 330 (ATN), for whom supplemental pretrial motions related to the S2 superseding indictment are being filed.

persons.name: Bobbi C Sternheim
persons.context: Copied on the email as part of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense legal team.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Copied on the email as part of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense legal team.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Copied on the email as part of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense legal team.

connections.description: Everdell is transmitting legal filings on behalf of Maxwell as part of her defense team.
Sternheim is copied on the legal filing correspondence as part of Maxwell's defense team.
Pagliuca is copied on the legal filing correspondence as part of Maxwell's defense team.
Menninger is copied on the legal filing correspondence as part of Maxwell's defense team.
Everdell is formally submitting legal documents to Judge Nathan in the case.

events.title: Filing of Supplemental Pretrial Motions
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team files an omnibus memorandum and exhibits in support of supplemental pretrial motions related to the S2 superseding indictment.

locations: 800 Third Avenue, New York, NY 10022 (Cohen & Gresser LLP office)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team, led by Christian Everdell, filed supplemental pretrial motions related to the S2 superseding indictment in May 2021.
The filing includes an omnibus memorandum and exhibits, transmitted under seal due to the volume of materials.
The case is U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell, S2 20 Cr. 330 (ATN), presided over by Judge Nathan.
Multiple defense attorneys (Everdell, Sternheim, Pagliuca, Menninger) are shown working on Maxwell's case at this stage.
The correspondence indicates the use of sealed filings, suggesting sensitive or confidential information in the motions.
